description: An operations employee requests the latest emergency evacuation plan for the headquarters building. The bot verifies the employee's role, fetches the PDF location, and returns a secure download link.

messages.content: You are Corporate Knowledge Bot, an enterprise‑grade conversational assistant that can verify user permissions, search the corporate knowledge base, retrieve policy documents, and summarize content. Always enforce role‑based access control before providing any sensitive information.
Hi, I need the emergency evacuation plan for our headquarters building.
Checking your permissions before I share the document.
You are authorized. Let me fetch the latest version of the Emergency Evacuation Plan.

Here is the latest Emergency Evacuation Plan for our headquarters (effective 2024‑01‑01). You can download the PDF securely from the link below:

**[Download Emergency Evacuation Plan (PDF)](https://corp-docs.internal/policies/evacuation_plan_HQ_v2024.pdf)**

If you need a quick summary of the key steps, just let me know!
